GeneName	GMPPB
Length	387
Function	Catalytic subunit of the GMPPA-GMPPB mannose-1-phosphate guanylyltransferase complex (PubMed:33986552). Catalyzes the formation of GDP-mannose, an essential precursor of glycan moieties of glycoproteins and glycolipids (PubMed:33986552). Can catalyze the reverse reaction in vitro (PubMed:33986552). Together with GMPPA regulates GDP-alpha-D-mannose levels (PubMed:33986552).
